掐.definition: to pick (flowers); to pinch; to nip; to pinch off; to clutch; (slang) to fight

掐斷.definition: to nip off (with fingernails etc); (fig.) to cut off (supply etc); to disconnect

掐架.definition: (of dogs, roosters etc) to fight; to tussle; (of people) to have an altercation with sb (physical or verbal)

掐死.definition: to throttle; to choke to death

掐算.definition: to count with one's fingers; on the spot calculation
